text: E'ina hu'negu Babiloni kumapina magore huno vahera omanitfa hanigeno anampina afi zagagafamo'ene afi kraramimo eno enemanisigeno, mananinkna huno zaza anankene nama ostretie nehaza namamo'ene anampina emanigahie. Ana hina Babiloni kumapina mago vahera omanitfa hanigeno, henkama mani'za vanaza knafinena anampina vahera omanigahaze.
